cards.title: Swarm Eater
setup: At the start of the game, put {SwarmEater}'s villain character cards into play, 'Power Hungry' side up. Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until {H - 1} targets, 2 traits, and Single-Minded Pursuit are revealed. Put them into play, and shuffle the rest of the revealed cards back into the villain deck.
gameplay: If Single-Minded Pursuit leaves play, flip {SwarmEater}'s villain character cards.
At the start of the villain turn, {SwarmEater} deals the pursued target 3 psychic damage.
Whenever a pursued hero deals damage to a target other than {SwarmEater}, you may move Single-Minded Pursuit next to that target.
cards.advanced: Increase damage dealt by {SwarmEater} to environment targets by 1.
flippedGameplay: At the start of the villain turn, {SwarmEater} deals the target other than itself with the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
Whenever Single-Minded Pursuit enters play, flip {SwarmEater}'s villain character cards.
Whenever a villain card is play {SwarmEater} deals the non-hero target other than itself with the lowest HP 3 melee damage.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Whenever {SwarmEater} destroys a villain target, play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Absorbed Nanites
body: This card and cards beneath it are indestructible.
Whenever {SwarmEater} destroys a villain target, put it beneath this card. Activate the Absorb text of all cards beneath this one. Ignore all other game text on those cards.

cards.title: “Behind you!”
body: Whenever a target enters play, {SwarmEater} deals that target 1 melee damage.
When this card is destroyed, play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: My neck is beginning{BR}to cause me discomfort.

cards.title: Blade Aug
body: At the end of the villain turn, this card deals the hero target with the highest HP 2 lightning damage.
Absorb: at the end of the villain turn, {SwarmEater} deals the target other than itself with the highest HP 2 lightning damage.

flavorQuotes.text: He is tracking down nanite-infected lifeforms{BR}and consuming their abilities.

cards.flavorReference: Omnitron-XI, The Coming of the Swarm #5

cards.title: Converted Biomass
body: This card and cards beneath it are indestructible.
Whenever {SwarmEater} destroys an environment target, put it beneath this card. Cards beneath this one have no game text.
At the end of the villain turn, {SwarmEater} regains X times 2 HP, where X is the number of cards beneath this one.

cards.title: Fire Aug
body: At the end of the villain turn this card deals the hero target with the second highest HP {H - 1} fire damage and each player must discard a card.
Absorb: at the start of the villain turn, {H - 2} players must discard a card.
cards.flavorReference: Ripfire, The Coming of the Swarm #3

cards.title: Follow the Screams
body: {SwarmEater} deals the {H} non-character targets with the lowest HP 4 irreducible projectile damage each.
{SwarmEater} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I don't think super-hearing{BR}is going to be necessary.

cards.title: Hunting Grounds
body: Reduce damage dealt to {SwarmEater} by environment targets by 1.
Increase damage dealt by {SwarmEater} to environment targets by 1.
Whenever {SwarmEater} destroys a target, play the top card of the environment deck.

flavorQuotes.text: We're all on the menu tonight.

cards.title: Insatiable Charge
cards.body: {SwarmEater} deals each other target 2 melee damage. For each target destroyed by {SwarmEater} this way, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.

flavorQuotes.text: The more he eats, the{BR}more dangerous he becomes.

cards.title: Jumper Aug
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by non-villain cards by 1.
At the end of the villain turn this card deals the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP {H - 2} melee damage each.
Absorb: reduce damage dealt to {SwarmEater} by 1.
cards.flavorReference: Longjump, The Coming of the Swarm #2

cards.title: Lasher Aug
body: At the end of the villain turn this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} projectile damage and destroys {H - 2} hero ongoing and/or equipment cards.
Absorb: at the start of the villain turn, destroy 1 hero ongoing or equipment card.
cards.flavorReference: Webtongue, The Coming of the Swarm #1

cards.title: Nanite Corruption
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until {H - 1} targets are revealed. Put those cards into play and discard the rest.
{SwarmEater} deals the {H} targets other than itself with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage each.
cards.flavorText: Cypher was not the only one augmented{BR}by the release of the nanite swarm.

cards.title: Single-Minded Pursuit
body: Play this card next to the target with the lowest HP, other than {SwarmEater}. The target next to this card is Pursued.
Increase damage dealt by {SwarmEater} by 2.
If the Pursued target leaves play, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Advice from an old tracker: run.

cards.flavorReference: Titan, The Coming of the Swarm #1

cards.title: Speed Aug
body: Increase damage dealt by villain targets by 1.
Absorb: increase damage dealt by {SwarmEater} by 1.

cards.title: Stalker Aug
body: At the end of the villain turn this card deals each hero target except the hero with the lowest HP {H - 2} irreducible energy damage.
Absorb: At the end of the villain turn, {SwarmEater} deals each other target 1 irreducible energy damage.
cards.flavorReference: Nighteye, The Coming of the Swarm #3

cards.title: Subterran Aug
body: At the start of the villain turn, put a random target from the villain trash into play.
Absorb: The first time {SwarmEater} would be dealt damage each turn, reduce that damage by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: Dig deep enough and you're bound to{BR}find somethin' you won't like.

cards.title: Updated Priorities
body: Search the villain deck and trash for Single-Minded Pursuit and put it into play. If you searched the deck, shuffle it.
Play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flavoText: “I will absorb your power! MWAHA!” he{BR}cried, as he ran past Cypher and toward{BR}the T-Rex.

cards.title: Venom Aug
body: At the end of the villain turn this card deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} projectile damage. Any target dealt damage this way deals itself 1 toxic damage.
Absorb: whenever {SwarmEater} deals damage to another target, that target deals itself 1 toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: We've all got new tricksss now!

cards.flavorReference: Viledart, The Coming of the Swarm #2

promoCards.title: Swarm Eater
setup: At the start of the game, put {SwarmEater}'s villain character cards into play, 'Distributed Hivemind' side up. Search the villain deck for Converted Biomass and Absorbed Nanites and remove them from the game. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: Whenever a villain target would deal damage to another villain target, redirect that damage to the hero target with the highest HP. When a villain target enters play, flip {SwarmEater}'s villain character cards.

Activate the Absorb text of all cards beneath villain targets, treating {SwarmEater}'s name as the name of that target. Ignore all other game text on those cards and destroy them when that target leaves play.
At then end of the villain turn, if there are no nanomutants in play, play the top card of the villain deck.
flippedGameplay: When {SwarmEater} flips to this side, discard cards from the top of the villain deck until a target is discarded.
Put the discarded target beneath the villain target that just entered play. Then flip {SwarmEater}'s character cards.
promoCards.flippedAdvanced: When {SwarmEater} flips to this side he regains {H - 2} HP.
